MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:05pm due to a fault on the electrical network caused by a third party near to Sheppards Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 5:45 PM on Thursday, 10 December 2020.
